title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I seen my profile at morning the total activity was 70, and suddenly at night the activity was changed to 84, after one day,  I seen my profile in next morning the total activity was changed from 84(at night) to 70, and now in night the activity changed from 70 to 84.is it a bug ? is it happening with other members?https://ibb.co/nDDmLxm

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: I don't think it's a bug. You get 14 activity points on an activity cycle. If you have more posts than your activity, you will see +14 activities once you post in an activity period. Say, you have 100 posts and 70 activities now and tomorrow is a new activity period. If you post one single time tomorrow, you will get 14 activity points after that one single post. I think this is what happened with you.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 24, 2023, 04:49:26 PMI seen my profile at morning the total activity was 70, and suddenly at night the activity was changed to 84, after one day,  I seen my profile in next morning the total activity was changed from 84(at night) to 70, and now in night the activity changed from 70 to 84.is it a bug ? is it happening with other members?https://ibb.co/nDDmLxmThis is why you need to read stickies on Beginners & Help Section before posting in the forum. This thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0 explains everything about your uncertainty and you should read it thoroughly as future reference in case you encounter this kind of issue in the future. ***Quote from Lauda PostHow is forum activity calculated?Activity is calculated with the following formula: Code:activity = min(time * 14, posts)Activity is increased by posting and is updated every hour; however, the updated number of activity points will be reflected at your profile at the end of the current activity period. As a note, in case you have latent activity points from earlier periods (meaning activity periods where you didn't post daily: in this case, the days when you did not post become latent activity points), these ones will be updated on your profile after 1 hour. You can gain a maximum of 14 activity points every 2 weeks.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Op, as long as you have enough post when the new activity circle comes all you have to do is to make a single post and you'll receive your complete 14 activities for that period. My guess is that you thought the activity will be added with your new posts made in that current activity cycle but that's not the way it works.
